featured.text: “You think she’s getting the best care in the world, but after a while you start to wonder: What is the objective?”
The objective is to promote peace all over the world, and to 26 barriers between every nationality.

definition.en_def: A goal or aim; something that one strives to achieve; not influenced by personal feelings or opinions.
definition.example: Her objective is to complete the project by the end of the month.
